articles.title: North American markets tumble, with U.S. stocks posting worst drop since June 2020 - CP24
articles.description: North American markets tumbled Tuesday after the latest reading on U.S. inflation disappointed traders, with Canada's main stock index down more than 300 points and all three major U.S. stock indexes seeing their worst day since June 2020.
